author: newsr.in
title: Nicole Kidman Steps Out After Daughter Isabella's Wedding
text: Nicole Kidman keeps it low-key while leaving the Noël Coward Theatre after her performance in Photograph 51 on Wednesday night (October 7) in London, England. The night before, the 48-year-old actress was spotted heading to grab some dinner at J Sheekey restaurant for the first time out since it was revealed that her daughter Isabella [...] »
